about_the_game:
Allows you to obtain a special set of items that will be useful during the game.

▼Obtained items
The Book of Musou (5)

Fiveleaf / Morning Glory / Reishi Mushroom (50 each)

Prime Chicken Meat / Fermented Milk / Yeast / Prime Fish / Wine / Spice (30 each)

Quality Tail Feather (10)

Prime Red Meat (60)

Fire Lord Gem / Ice Lord Gem / Lighting Lord Gem / Wind Lord Gem / Slash Lord Gem / Poison Lord Gem / Void Lord Gem (1 each)

▼How to use
From within the game, talk with a Trader at a city, and then select "DLC" to obtain the items.
detailed_description:
Allows you to obtain a special set of items that will be useful during the game.

▼Obtained items
The Book of Musou (5)

Fiveleaf / Morning Glory / Reishi Mushroom (50 each)

Prime Chicken Meat / Fermented Milk / Yeast / Prime Fish / Wine / Spice (30 each)

Quality Tail Feather (10)

Prime Red Meat (60)

Fire Lord Gem / Ice Lord Gem / Lighting Lord Gem / Wind Lord Gem / Slash Lord Gem / Poison Lord Gem / Void Lord Gem (1 each)

▼How to use
From within the game, talk with a Trader at a city, and then select "DLC" to obtain the items.

name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 9 Useful Gems & Materials Set　（役立つ宝玉・素材セット）（助益多寶玉・素材組合）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played

short_description: Allows you to obtain a special set of items that will be useful during the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
